abstract: Data Domain accepted NetApp’s revised offer of $30 a share, but EMC shrugged off the rejection of its similar bid and Wall Street indicated that it expected the bidding war to continue.
snippet: Data Domain accepted NetApp’s revised offer of $30 a share, but EMC shrugged off the rejection of its similar bid and Wall Street indicated that it expected the bidding war to continue.
lead_paragraph: Update | 6:03 p.m. Is the bidding war for Data Domain over? Don’t bet on it, Wall Street says.

headline.main: More Shots Fired in Data Domain Bidding War
